title: Plz help me i need answers
body:
OK so like a total dumbass i decided to click on a free rp link and had my account stolen.
its been like this for 6 months and i have been trying to fill out all the question the riot employees ask me.
PLEASE PLEASE RIOT HELP ME
ive spent so much on that account the accounts summoner name is wishinlove 
my new accounts name is xayrah why did i make this account cause im addicted to the game 
ive already spent money on my new account so i was wondering if everything on the wishinlove account can be transfered to my new account because i have already bought the stuff on wishinlove
such as academy ahri, popstar ahri, arcade ahri, super galaxy kindred, shadow fire kindred, snow bunny nidalee, leopard nidalee, bewitched nidalee, slayer jinx, star guardian jinx, star guardian lux, road rage miss fortune, project ashe, crimson elite riven, warring kingdoms katarina, project fiora, royal guard fiora, sejuani dawnchaser, arcade ezreal, death blossom khaziks, high noon jhin, heart seeker sona, pentakill sona, pick pocket twitch, snow day gnar, neon strike vi, riot girl tristana, firefang warwick, i think i had surprise part fiddlesticks, sorceress lux, sanguine garen, sherwood forest ashe, nottingham ezreal. 
if thats not proof enough on all the skin i have then i dont know what is.

PLZ RIOT PLZ PLZ PLZ PLZ HELP ME.


sincerly, 
xayrah

replies.body: Yikes that really sucks :(. If you're ables to remember any of that account recovery info, that will be your best bet at getting all of those skins on the other account again. We won't be able to transfer content between accounts, but if you do happen to remember any of those questions you're always welcome to reach back out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

then keep answering the supports questions correctly.

Its their way to keep your account safe.
